* Desmonus hissed as she looked out the window, her optic sensors zooming in 
on ever little tid-bit that drew attention.
But she hated staying still for so long and decided that she would try to 
capture her pray once more before going after something else.
Hungry enough to drain a whole faction dry, she left the window and exited 
the ship, converting into beats mode before slithering off into the sky.
She would catch that Transmetal 2 salamander in her coils, squeeze until his 
lungs popped and drain ever drop of living essence from his body!
Hmm�but no. That would be a waste. If she destroyed him now then she 
couldn�t come back and feed later.
Better to take only what she needed.
Desmonus ran a forked tongue over her scaled lips; she could just taste the 
mech fluid now!
But soon, the rubble of the CF came into view and she dropped from the sky. 
Better to be stealthy then stupid. *
